Articles.Content:
Now I can't really think how this would work. But 21 dares time!

Rules:

2 people can play. Start by saying something along the lines of: I need a challenger or whatever.

If more then 1 person reply to your challenge then you can choose.

More then 1 game can go on but still between 2 people.

You HAVE to reply to your opponents last numbers.

You can go up to 3 numbers. Allowed: 2,3,4. Disallowed: 2,3,4,5/2,3,5,6 etc

The dare has to be in game ksp and, if the winner is stuck or chooses, can be chose by others.

You have to have valid proof that you've done your dare. Videos, pictures etc...

Good luck everyone!

Hint: lucky 16!

Edited October 29, 2013 by Rex3921
